I confirm that when placing this booking I, or my guests, are not gathering indoors in groups of more than two households (your support bubble counts as one household) - this includes : • When dining out or going to the pub or gather outdoors in a group of more than six people from different households. • Gatherings larger than 6 should only take place if everyone is from just two household. • Interact socially with anyone outside the group you are attending a place with, even if you see other people you know, for example, in a restaurant, community centre or place of worship hold or attend celebrations (such as parties) where it is difficult to maintain social distancing (your support bubble counts as one household) I agree me and my guests adhere to all the above guidance You can place a refund or replacement request in More For Home Delivery More For Free Delivery days.
